website_summaries.verdict: Basically, the Nike Zoom Evidence has what you need in a basketball sneaker. It has good traction, provides excellent support, and feels light on the feet; making it a good option for competitive and casual ballers.The shoe’s minimalist style and comfortable fit make it great to use in other activities as well. All in all, the Zoom Evidence is another solid budget performance shoe from Nike.
pros: Nearly all buyers are happy with how the shoes perform, and they highly recommend it
A good number of reviewers just love the look and feel of the Nike Zoom Evidence
Like the Air Jordan 12, these shoes are very comfortable according to most wearers
A handful of purchasers note that the shoes are good for running
The shoes have good ankle support, several observe
Players are also saying the same thing about the Puma Clyde Court Disrupt
One user specifically uses the Zoom Evidence for tennis and claims that it provides excellent support
These Nike basketball shoes fit perfectly and run true to size, a couple of users note
A player reports that the shoes have a good grip on the court
Some comment that these Nike basketball sneakers have cool colors and are very stylish
A few wearers notice that the shoes feel light and durable
cons: One user claims that the shoes do not have enough padding around the ankle area
The Nike basketball shoes feel very flat according to one reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but is it fake Nike with paints on it?
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking I would have given 5☆ but right out of the box there is a black marking, not sure if it's paint or black threads from manufacture, it seems to be defect like a painted on the white background *( picture attached) and second strange that the shoe laces were laced out of the box not a big deal but it supposed to be new shoe. And third is that the size seems smaller. As I ordered 11 M but it fits very tight like it's 10 narrow. Makes me think that it's not original Nike and maybe fake? I don't know what to do about the black paint or thread defect on the new shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dk

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe Runs A Little Narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift. If your foot is wide you may not like these as They do run a little narrow on the foot. The person I gave them to kept them and is happy with them. They look really nice on the foot. The color is very pretty blue.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived timely, they look good, I tried them on and they fit great. They don’t have a lot of arch support or cushioning, so you will have to get your own supports. I play several pick-up games weekly and need a good reliable shoe. These are working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Capeau1214

customer_reviews.title: Quick to wear
customer_reviews.text: True to size with terrific ankle support. However, the shoe does wear quickly on outside courts.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Shoe just narrow across the top part of foot had to return
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Son and he loves them, light and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Moon 515

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for daughter for high school b-ball. She says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Made of thin fabric
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but top fabric is very thin, one can feel wind coming through it in cold weather. I wish Nike should chose better fabric than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daljit K.

customer_reviews.title: decent Achilles support. Help with some tendonitis I was ...
customer_reviews.text: decent Achilles support. Help with some tendonitis I was experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: James Hall

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was son was looking for, he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was son was looking for, he loves the look and feel of them. He has been wearing for basketball and has had no issues. We would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: LuLaRoe Barbi

customer_reviews.title: My son has had these for awhile now and they ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has had these for awhile now and they are still holding up to a 14 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Cota

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes ripped at the seam after only 6 weeks. I wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, and he loves the shoe and the fit
customer_reviews.author: D.Lucero_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: was not what i expected quality wise, picture makes shoe look better
customer_reviews.author: bigsav32

customer_reviews.title: 0 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fit great. This sucks, being a veteran I can’t ware these, anyone has the right to express them selves as long as they don’t promote violence against other people. That’s what I was fighting for and still will. I would return hem but it’s past the date of return. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dorwart 3rd

customer_reviews.title: The shoes arrived broken. I can't return it, ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived broken. I can't return it, because I live outside the EEUU, in Dominican Republic and the shipping cost is very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: solesmil batista

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball shoe. Lightweight, good support, the "fly wires" on the outside of the toe box are helpful. Most of all my wide hobbit feet fit well in these, unlike a lot of Nike shoes. I often wear EE or 4E shoes but the medium width on these is good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Dixson

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Zoom Evidence Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Sneakers for men of the brand Nike. Model – Nike Zoom evidence
